snippet: Isaiah Thomas didn't hold his tongue earlier this week in describing what he said was a Celtics team he thought was void of its all-around toughness from years past....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas didn't hold his tongue earlier this week in describing what he said was a Celtics team he thought was void of its all-around toughness from years past.

headline.main: Thomas Has 29, Anthony Tossed as Celtics Beat Knicks 115-87
headline.print_headline: Thomas Has 29, Anthony Tossed as Celtics Beat Knicks 115-87
